audioText: Son talent incroyable pour la musique lui a permis de réussir dans tous les concours.
question: What allowed him to succeed in all competitions?
explanation: The text states 'Son talent incroyable pour la musique lui a permis de réussir dans tous les concours' - His incredible talent for music allowed him to succeed in all competitions. 'Incroyable' means 'incredible/amazing' and emphasizes the exceptional nature of his musical ability.
